Name: Coin Flipping Simulator for Probability and Statistics
About the game: 1. Set the number of trials and speed you want. 2. Press the Flip! button. 3. Observe and analyze the experiment. This simulator will help you understand 'Probability and Statistics', Especially 'Law of Large Numbers'. You can use it when you study or teach someone. Features Simple Easy Realistic
